title: Pitcher R.A. Dickey Tells Kids It's OK To Be Different
teaser: Pitcher R.A. Dickey is a rare bird in major league baseball: a master of the knuckleball. Now he's also a children's author. NPR's Don Gonyea talks with him about his new book, Knuckleball Ned.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
